entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 19.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: 14.7°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 31. POP 30%
